resources.string: diBbO is a user-friendly app that helps you accurately calculate your monthly electricity usage and expenses in Malaysia. Managing your energy consumption has never been easier.
Step 1 : This app only supports numeric input; letters are not allowed.
Step 2 : Enter the kWh value and the rebate percentage (0-5%).
Step 3 : Tap the Calculate button to see the result.
Step 4 : Use the Reset button to clear and enter new values.
